name: Turma da Mônica na Terra dos Monstros
name_original: Turma da Mônica na Terra dos Monstros
description:
Turma da Mônica na Terra dos Monstros is an action, adventure and platformer game developed by Tectoy. It came out on 01-09-1994. It was published by Tectoy. The game is rated as "Recommended" on RAWG.
Turma da Mônica na Terra dos Monstros is available on Genesis.
